skills.skill: Power Apps (Model Driven Apps, Canvas Apps)
Azure Blob and Azure Cognitive Services
Integration with REST/SOAP APIs and Postman

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and enhance Power Platform solutions, extending the Microsoft practice.
Mentor and guide less experienced staff, contributing to the team's goals with creativity and latitude.
Contribute to web application development, C# development, and Visual Studio development using Agile methodologies.
Utilize code control/version/build tools, AI Builder, Power Virtual Agents, Power BI, Azure services, unit testing frameworks, and integration with REST/SOAP APIs.
Collaborate in large-scale Agile software development projects, following best practices for development in an Agile environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a technology-related field (Master's preferred)
